scan_script_only_check.description: In general, for a single record only a few Workflow context will be running. If a high number of Workflow context are active, this often indicates an issue on the starting conditions of your Workflow. More then 10 active Workflow context is considered being a high number.
scan_script_only_check.name: High number of workflows running for a single record
scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: Resolve the high number of triggered Workflow context and investigate the starting conditions of your Workflow and correct where necessary.
scan_script_only_check.short_description: High number of workflows running for a single record
scan_script_only_check.sys_name: High number of workflows running for a single record
